name: Wizard Fishing
description:
What is a wizard without his staff? A naked drunk fisherman. Fish for fish to buy back your clothes, spells and dignity and if you fish long enough, you might even fish out your lost staff.

Should you click when the red arrow points at any of the colorfull rectangles your wizard friend will cast a spell, fish will be caught and money earned. You can also buy new a spell after every day in shop and boost your fishing skills.

Wizard Fishing is a free arcade game created in only three days with memes and love for Ludum Dare 45. 

Controls: Left Mouse Button

Software: Unity, Aseprite, Piskel, BeepBox, Audacity

Team: Daxic, Tollona
